subject: Sports Injuries
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Neymar, Brazil’s star player, continues to undergo treatment for a broken vertebra sustained in Friday’s match. Colombia’s Juan Camilo Zúñiga apologized for the hit.
snippet: Neymar, Brazil’s star player, continues to undergo treatment for a broken vertebra sustained in Friday’s match. Colombia’s Juan Camilo Zúñiga apologized for the hit.
